post_content_localized.en:
Sagamore Hotel is delighted to unveil our newly renovated pool area that features luxury cabanas, breathable chaise lounges, umbrellas, a pool bar serving up innovative cocktails, and additional areas for rest and repose in our outdoor oasis. Balance the classic Art Deco vibe of Miami with modern amenities at the Sagamore Hotel pool. Unwind on your Miami Beach getaway by spending the day splashing and relaxing poolside with Sagamore.

Stretch out on our pool deck and watch the sunrise over Miami Beach. Palm trees and lounge chairs line the edge of the pool deck creating a calm and peaceful reprieve from the bustle of the beach just beyond. With ocean views and aromatic sea air, you get all the benefits of the beach, without getting sand in your swimsuit.

Make your entrance into the turquoise water when the sun is at its hottest. Our zero-entry pool has a gradual slope down to the deep end to mimic the beach and make entering the water easier for our guests. Our pool is heated to be in sync with the changing Miami weather. Surrounded by a lush palm canopy, the pool area is buffered from exterior sounds and winds to give you an exclusive beach club experience without outside distractions. Create some waves and then snag a reclining lounge chair to bask under the Miami sun.

 

Indulge in Miami-inspired small plates and grab a cocktail from our pool bar. Enjoy minty mojitos, frozen tropical mixed drinks, or our latest signature creations from our talented mixologists. Try the Mona Lisa cocktail, made with the anise flavors of Pastis and fresh-squeezed citrus for a refreshing poolside drink. Simply wave over our poolside bartenders to order your mid-day cocktail.

After a day catching rays, working on your tan, and taking a dip, get a spectacular view of the brilliant shades of pinks, oranges, and yellows that light up the sky as the sun sets over Miami.

Are you ready for some pool therapy? Choose from our best rates and special offers when you book direct with the Sagamore Hotel, an iconic Miami Beach destination known for its unique collection of contemporary art, spacious suites, and prime location only steps from the white sands of South Beach.
